name: Rossignol X6 Combi Boots - Unisex
description: For recreation or training, this boot's cut lets your feet roll naturally for easy, efficient progress. The X6 Combi Boots suit both classic or skate strides with active heel support for solid control. The upper has a precise, enveloping fit for comfort and power transfer to the skis.Moulded 3-D cuffs with Velcro® straps enhance stability and power.Thermo-adjustable polyester liners ensure control and comfort.Speed-lace locks for easy closure and excellent foot support.Mobile cuffs allow easy fore and aft movement while retaining torsional rigidity.High-volume last provides a great out-of-the-box fit for all-day comfort.
